name: StudyNotion
content: A full-stack EdTech platform  designed to streamline online learning and teaching. It features secure user authentication, role-based access (admin/instructor/student).
stack: React, Tailwind, Node , Express , MongoDb , Cloudinary , Razorpay

name: Dsa Sorting Visualizer
content: An interactive React tool to visualize and understand sorting algorithms.

name: MERN E-commerce
content: Developed a full-stack e-commerce platform with user authentication, product browsing, cart, and secure checkout.
